item.title: MonoMAE: Enhancing Monocular 3D Detection through Depth-Aware Masked Autoencoders
item.description: MonoMAE enhances monocular 3D object detection by using depth-aware masked autoencoders to effectively handle object occlusions, achieving superior performance on both occluded and non-occluded object…
